newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade $66,light - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade $66,light - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the panhandle area Friday, USDA said.

Slaughter steers and heifers steady to $0.50 per cwt lower in light test. Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 3,000 slaughter steers and 900 heifers following weekly movement of 97,000.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1200 lbs 66.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 950-1100 lbs 66.00.
